item.description: The day will begin with an overview of FDI Youngevity which was founded by Legendary, world renowned Dr. Joel Wallach. Registration begins at 9:30 am. At 10am we will overview the company and give you an opportunity to sample some of the most popular products and we will feature our healthy coffee line - Javafit! We will then break for lunch until 12pm, registration will begin for Doctor Joel Wallach. He will start promptly at 12:30pm. If you are sick of prescriptions meds and are looking for a natural solution, come and listen to Doc Wallach. He will answer the questions we have about modern medicine. To get a taste of what you will hear visit www.FDI4Life.com and click on Dead Doctors Don't Lie! MUST RSVP with Bernadette at 603-834-4587 or dette101@gmail.com to attend for free.

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Health Seminar with renowned Naturopath Dr. Joel Wallach
